data.text:
Isabella Leong Quick InfoHeight5 ft 7Â¾ inWeight53 kgDate of BirthJune 23, 1988Zodiac SignCancerEye ColorDark Brown

Isabella Leong is a Hong Kong-based actress and former singer who has worked in projects such as The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor, The Knot, Diary, Spider Lilies, Missing, Murmur of the Hearts, A Chinese Tall Story, Dragon Squad, and McDull, the Alumni. She is also known for her singing career during which she released albums and extended plays like I am Isabella and To Find Love.

Boyfriend / Spouse

She has dated â

Richard Li (2008-2011) â She met Hong Kong businessman and philanthropist Richard Li, son of billionaire and philanthropist Li Ka-shing, on a movie set in 2008. The duo has an age difference of 21 years and she was just 20 years old when she met him. They welcomed their first son Ethan Li Cheung Tsz on April 26, 2009, and later their twin sons were born in San Francisco in June 2010. Leong and Li announced in March 2011 that they had amicably ended their relationship.

She is of Chinese and Portuguese descent.

Isabella Leong Facts

On the paternal side, her ancestors are from one of the most prominent and long-established Macanese families i.e. the Nolasco da Silva family.

Her father died of a drug overdose when she was just 6-month old and she never received any acknowledgment from her fatherâs family. Hence, she took her motherâs last name.

She left school when she was 12 in order to support her family financially.

She co-starred as Cheung Bik-Yan in the 2006 drama film, Isabella, for which she won the Golden Bauhinia Award for âBest New Performerâ.
